name: Aritra Karmakar
title: Full Stack Developer
profile: A versatile and highly motivated Full Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience, including 2+ years of professional work experience. Skilled in React, Next.js, Python, DevOps, and data analysis, with a strong foundation in designing and deploying scalable applications. Experienced in leading end-to-end software development projects and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time.

education.degree: BE in Information Science and Engineering

work_experience.Project/Team Involvement: City Scale Model Development Project, Individual Software Contributor
work_experience.Overall contribution: Sole software architect and developer for three key applications as a part of the transportation model development effort: Digital Survey Tool, Aggregate Travel Demand Model (ATDM), and Disaggregate Travel Demand Model (DTDM).

Experience Points.Application: Digital Survey Tool Development and Survey Enumeration
Details: Carried out major enhancements to a large-scale React + Flask web app for household surveys (10,000+ households) as a full stack developer as per project requirements.

Designed a responsive UI, implemented efficient state management, JWT-based authentication, and performance-tuned APIs and PostgreSQL queries to enhance web performance and minimise server load; automated deployment, monitoring, load balancing, and version control workflows.
Built real-time admin dashboards and tools; supported field deployment by training a 40-member intern team and resolving live issues during survey execution.
Automated post-survey workflows by coding Python scripts to cut manual effort by 85%.

Experience Points.Application: Disaggregate & Aggregate Travel Demand Models (DTDM & ATDM) - Python/C++ QGIS Plugins
Details: Developed a lightweight Flask + Vanilla JS user-interactive dashboard to visualize ATDM outputs (charts, heatmaps) and integrated with QGIS via shell script automation, reducing load time by 80% by utilising DuckDB's in-memory processing.
Acted as data engineer for ATDM, optimizing 70â€“80% of tool logic for large data handling, cutting storage by 75% and improving I/O performance.
Led a major performance improvement effort to convert all long-running Python modules to C++, achieving 95% faster runtime and 80% lower memory use.

Served as a Software SME for IISc in the development of some critical Python modules for these two tools (ATDM and DTDM) and contributed towards researching and reverse-engineering existing tools and trends for drafting the requirements.
Guided the development team on multithreading, I-O for large-scale matrix computations, optimization, debugging, and testing, open-source best practices, and technical documentation.

Experience Points: Collaborated with the product team to debug UI issues and implement user-friendly interfaces, enhancing usability and ensuring consistency.
Enhanced web performance by 20%, eliminating props drilling by efficient state management and implementation of server components in Next.js.
Resolved 2 major and 1 minor issues as an individual contributor in the product dashboard using React and TypeScript, enhancing user experience and functionality.

Engaged in pair programming with senior developers to troubleshoot and resolve frontend issues, including unnecessary re-rendering and complex ProseMirror editor behavior bugs, gaining hands-on experience in performance optimization and debugging.

Collaborated with the development team to deliver a client-facing, fully responsive e-commerce platform using the MERN stack, tailored to meet real-time business requirements and achieved a certification from Edureka.
Designed and implemented key features inspired by Zomato, integrating payment gateway through Paytm JS Checkout and secure authentication.
Worked on Edureka's Learning Management System to resolve support tickets, address real-time bugs, and ensure system stability for end-users.
Engaged in pair programming to enhance LMS scalability, storage, and monitoring by leveraging AWS services like EC2, ECS, S3, and CloudWatch.

projects.title: Cloud-Based Collaborative IDE
description: Independently architected and developed a real-time, cloud-based IDE to support collaborative coding in isolated user environments.
Built a scalable frontend using React and Monaco Editor, delivering a VS Code inspired experience in the browser with real time terminal emulation.
Implemented efficient state management with useContext + useReducer, paired with localStorage to persist data on-reload and provide consistent UX.
Engineered a backend with Node.js + Express, exposing APIs for file I/O, terminal interaction using web-socket (socket.io), and user session handling.
Leveraged Chokidar to monitor file system changes and dynamically update the file tree structure utilising the socket bridge.
Tech Stack: JavaScript, React, Monaco Editor, Node.js, Express, Socket.io, JWT, Chokidar, xTerm, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB

projects.title: Inventory Management Web App
description: Identified inefficiencies in manual inventory tracking and built a centralized Next.js web app for our family business, cutting manual efforts by 90%.
Implemented a dynamic Sidebar to display product categories and subcategories, improving navigation and speeding up product access.
Empowered admins with the ability to Add, Update, and Delete products and categories via a secure management interface.
Implemented Redis for caching frequently accessed data, drastically improving query performance and reducing load times.
Utilized React Query for efficient and optimized data fetching with automatic caching, background updates, and request deduplication.
Managed complex application state with Redux Toolkit, reducing unnecessary re-renders and enhancing web performance.
Tech-Stack: TypeScript, Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, Redis, React Query, Redux

expertise: Full Stack End to End Development

achievements.title: SMART INDIA HACKATHON 2022
achievements.description: Grand Finale Selection: Selected for the Grand Finale of Smart India Hackathon (SIH) 2022, showcasing exceptional problem-solving and innovation skills.
achievements.project: Developed and delivered a MATLAB simulation for the project titled 'Design an Indigenous Monitoring Communication Receiver'.
